section.title: Validating the Dashboard Install
section.para: To validate the Dashboard installation, make sure that your firewall isn't blocking TCP/8000 and just point your browser at the server on port 8000. If you are running the server on the same machine as your browser, this would be "http://localhost:8000". You should see a login window. Enter the credentials for users you created with the Identity Service, Keystone. For example, enter "admin" for the username and "secretword" as the password.
